data.introduce: 在线分销产品为客户提供了的一套高效、易用、低成本的航班信息查询服务，可以帮助用户快速、准确的获取所需的航班信息。
data.business:
国内、国际航线航班可用舱位查询
国内、国际航线最早有座的航班信息查询
国内、国际航线班期时刻查询
国内、国际航线指定日期的班期时刻查询
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"OTA_AVE_RQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OTA_AVE_RQ","children":[{"name":"Header","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标头业务指令用于后台识别，字段值固定填写为：*GAPP","children":[]},{"name":"InFormat","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"输入格式定义，字段值固定填写为 1（表示 XML 格式）","children":[]},{"name":"OutFormat","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"输出格式定义，字段值固定填写为 1（表示 XML 格式）","children":[]},{"name":"Office","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代理人Office号：Office","children":[]},{"name":"Command","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"用户指令：Command","children":[{"name":"Statement","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"用户指令的具体表述：Statement","children":[{"name":"SysType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"系统类型，代理人用户固定填写为：C：SysType","children":[]},{"name":"PID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"pid号，可填写5位数字的虚拟pid号：PID","children":[]},{"name":"WA","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"工作区，字段值可固定填写为 B","children":[]},{"name":"StatementName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指令名称，字段值固定填写为 AV","children":[]},{"name":"GDSName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"GDS 名称，字段值固定填写为 1E","children":[]},{"name":"Office","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代理人 Office 号","children":[]},{"name":"SerialNo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"序列号，可以为每个请求生成一个唯一的序列号：SerialNo","children":[]},{"name":"RequestNbr","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"用于指定返回的最多查询结果数量，该字段值需要小于
50，建议在联程查询时使用","children":[]},{"name":"format1","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"基于城市对的AV查询，对应于主机命令行格式：AV: option /origin dest date /time /seats /airline type class：format1","children":[{"name":"option","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"显示参数
A 航线按照到达时间排序
D 只显示所有航段都支持电子客票的航线
E 航线按照飞行时间排序
M 提取所有的代码共享市场方航班
O 提取所有的承运方航班
S 要求显示航线中至少有一个航段为 STAR ALLIANCE 的航段。
（STAR ALLIANCE 的航段是指：STAR OC,STAR MC(STAR OC)）
T 要求显示航线中至少有一个航段为 SKY TEAM 的航段。（SKY TEAM
的航段是指：SKY OC,SKY MC）
V 舱位的状态（座位）是 A 的航线
W 要求显示航线中至少有一个航段为 ONE WORLD 的航段。
（ONE WORLD 的航段是指：1W OC,1W MC）
X：如果当前查询指定的日期无航班，则不再返回临近日期的航班
G：经停点详情查询
A 和 E 不能同时出现，S, T 和 W 不能同时出现,O 和 M 不能同时出
现。
如果 A 和 E 都没有出现，则航线按照起飞时间排序。其他指令的其
他格式中出现该情况时，参照本格式说明处理。","children":[]},{"name":"origin","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"起飞城市/机场代码","children":[]},{"name":"dest","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"到达城市/机场代码","children":[]},{"name":"date","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段起飞日期，DDMMYY","children":[]},{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段起飞日期","children":[]},{"name":"seats","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"座位数","children":[]},{"name":"airline","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航线种类，缺省则查询所有种类的航线
N :查询经停点为 0 的航班
D :查询直达航班，不考虑经停点的个数
C1: 查询联程点为 1 的联程航班
C2: 查询联程点为 2 的联程航班
C3: 查询联程点为 3 的联程航班
C4: 查询联程点为 4 的联程航班","children":[]},{"name":"class","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位代码指定","children":[]},{"name":"fareclass","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"gds","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"jdts","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"jdt","type":"array","quantity":"0..8","default":"","description":"journey
